text: Gus R. Douglass (February 22, 1927 â€“ March 19, 2015) was an American politician and member of the Democratic Party. He served as Agriculture Commissioner of West Virginia for 44 years. Douglass died from falling two days earlier in his house in Mason County on March 19, 2015 aged 88. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American civil servants Category:Politicians from West Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gus Douglass
